inclusion.criterion: newly diagnosed colon, pancreatic, esophageal, lung, gastric cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: hepatitis C or B with elevated levels of alpha-fetoprotein
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: radiological findings suggestive of mass in the liver
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: advanced heart or lung disease that precludes conscious sedation
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has HCV cirrhosis, grade II esophageal varices, and recent admission for UGIB. He also describes new imbalance leading to a fall.
